# castai_ai_optimizer_hosted_models (Data Source)

Retrieve AI Optimizer hosted models for a cluster



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) CAST AI cluster ID.
- `organization_id` (String) CAST AI organization ID.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `models` (List of Object) List of hosted models (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--models))

<a id="nestedatt--models"></a>
### Nested Schema for `models`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String)
- `name` (String)
